languages.text: {n}Вздохнув, Абеляр тихо комментирует:{/n} "Добро пожаловать в наше братство недоумевающих, господин Ульфар. Привыкайте, Вольный Торговец умеет удивлять".
{n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."
languages.original_text: {n}Вздохнув, Абеляр тихо комментирует:{/n} "Добро пожаловать в наше братство недоумевающих, господин Ульфар. Привыкайте, Вольный Торговец умеет удивлять".

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

languages.text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir et déclare d'un air las :{/n} « Bienvenue dans notre troupe de sceptiques, seigneur Ulfar ! Il va falloir vous y habituer : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne manque jamais de nous surprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir et déclare d'un air las :{/n} « Bienvenue dans notre troupe de sceptiques, maître Ulfar ! Il va falloir vous y habituer : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne manque jamais de nous surprendre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，轻声开了口。{/n}“欢迎加入一头雾水同好会，乌尔法大人！您尽量努力习惯吧，行商浪人总是会做出令人震惊的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，轻声开了口。{/n}“欢迎加入一头雾水同好会，乌尔法大师！您尽量努力习惯吧，行商浪人总是会做出令人震惊的事情。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはため息をつき、静かに言った。{/n}「複雑な友愛の世界へようこそ、ウルファー様！どうか慣れてください。自由開拓者といると驚かされることばかりなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはため息をつき、静かに言った。{/n}「複雑な友愛の世界へようこそ、ウルファー様！どうか慣れてください。自由開拓者といると驚かされることばかりなのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt und bemerkt leise:{/n} "Willkommen in unserer Bruderschaft der Ratlosen, mein Lord Ulfar! Gewöhnt Euch besser daran. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} schafft es immer wieder, für Erstaunen zu sorgen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard seufzt und bemerkt leise:{/n} "Willkommen in unserer Bruderschaft der Ratlosen, Meister Ulfar! Gewöhnt Euch besser daran. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} schafft es immer wieder, für Erstaunen zu sorgen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira y murmura entre dientes:{/n} «¡Bienvenido a la hermandad de los perplejos, mi lord Ulfar! Váyase acostumbrando; {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente nunca deja de sorprendernos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira y murmura entre dientes:{/n} «¡Bienvenido a la hermandad de los perplejos, maese Ulfar! Váyase acostumbrando; {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente nunca deja de sorprendernos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, iç çektikten sonra sessizce konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Şaşkınların kardeşliğine hoş geldin Lord Ulfar! Ne kadar çabuk alışırsan o kadar iyi. Zira Hür Tacir, şaşırtmaktan ödün vermez."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs and comments quietly:{/n} "Welcome to our fraternity of the perplexed, my lord Ulfar! Get used to it. The Rogue Trader never fails to astonish."
